_sText:
This is a re-make of the map the map crackhouse_xz_5 BY USMC Recon.

New:
Zareh's police cars and government crown victoria for destroyed white cars and the apc
More explosive oil drums
Opened both doors on the hostage rescue side of the ct spawn
Increased player clip heights around the map
Widened some doorways in the crackhouse
Player-activated c4 for both teams (use dark blue button)
More airducts added to the building outside the crackhouse front door
Removed a window that t's were often spawn killed through
Added wood "Z" over front window
Added TV console on crackhouse 1st floor
Added file cabinets in T spawn that can be pushed over "blood bath" room
floor
Some texture crates have been made in moveable prop crates
Added a truck with oil drums in front of crackhouse instead of the green car
Mailbox and phonebooth (sorry can't go in (not my fault)) outside crackhouse front
Added a police car behind orange barricades on backside of crackhouse
Added dumpster in alley behind the building in front of the crackhouse
Moved boxes outside crackhouse front so window can be accessed more     easily
Added bunk bed in front corner hostage room
Added a "drug lab" (not much to it - propane, jars, some white texture rocks) instead of random room in t spawn
Added another secret room (break wall, secret room is there)
Added dead ct's and a hostage in the "blood bath" room
Fixed front door breakable lock (before you could break one lock and the other would still be there, but you could open both doors)
Added a "blowhorn callout" coming from speakers near ct spawn
it tells the T's that the police is here with a warrant
and they want all of them to come out with their hands up.
Many props have been slightly moved for improved gameplay
